test.input_output package¶

Submodules¶

test.input_output.test_email module¶

class test.input_output.test_email.TestEmail(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Tests the methods of the Email class

TestEmail.test_extract_server()¶

Unitary test for the input_output.Email.extract_server method. Tests that the server name is correctly extracted when an email adress is given.

test.input_output.test_recorder module¶

class test.input_output.test_recorder.TestRecorder(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Tests the methods of the Recorder class

TestRecorder.recordTooShortCreation()¶

Creates a record too short, this method should raise an RuntimeError.

TestRecorder.setUp()¶

Inits each tests, creating a Recorder object.

TestRecorder.test_getFrames(testedList=[1, 2, 3])¶

Tests that the getFrames method returns the frames list and reset it. params:

testedList -> the list used in the test
TestRecorder.test_newFrame(data=1)¶

Unitary test for the input_output.recorder.Recorder.newFrame() method. Tests that a new frame is created when the newFrame method is called. The return of this method is tested also. params:

data -> the added data in the test
TestRecorder.test_record()¶

Tests the behaviour of the start and stop methods. A recording is started and stopped, the file must be created and must have the WAV format.

TestRecorder.test_recordTooShortException()¶

Tests that an RuntimeException is raised when a record too short is created
